title.narrative: Police Support Project by PricewaterhouseCoopers - Closure underway

description.narrative: This activity (Police Support Project by PricewaterhouseCoopers - Closure underway) is a component of Security Sector Accountability & Police Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £30,965,482. This component benefits Congo (Democratic Republic), and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Public finance management (PFM), Security system management and reform. , with the following implementing partners: PwC. The start date is 01-12-2009 and the end date is 30-06-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
